artist: Artist: Mission Mini-Comix, San Francisco; Publisher: Mission Mini-Comix, San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, xerographic text and illustration of an angel- and a demon-like figure before a skyline printed on wove paper; 8 pp.
title: A Mission Mini Comix Guide Of Protester Do's & Don'ts: David & Douchey
